name: Building Escape
description:
This was my first attempt at making a game with C++ and Blueprints in UE4. I took what I learned from Ben Tristems UE4 course and expanded it a little to make a mini escape game. I hope you all enjoy!

Music by

"The House of Leaves" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
